message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This unique item holds significant value to us, reflecting over $1500000 in its creation and development. We believe it could be an exceptional addition to your collection or business. Considering its high quality and rarity, we propose an initial offer of $2000000. We are open to discussion and look forward to your response.

Thank you for offering your premium product, Alice. I appreciate the value you attribute to it, but considering my budget and the market value, I'm proposing a counteroffer of $1500000. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.
